definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

nothing sadder than a withered heart (idiom attributed to Confucius by Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])/no greater sorrow than a heart that never rejoices/the worst sorrow is not as bad as an uncaring heart/nothing is more wretched than apathy
pinyin: ai1 mo4 da4 yu2 xin1 si3

definition: greater than or equal to ≥/at least as great as
pinyin: xiang1 dang1 yu2 huo4 da4 yu2

sentences.english: As you can see, as long as the initial value is above zero, this function will terminate.
sentences.chinese: 可見，只要初始值大於零，這個函數就能夠終止。

sentences.english: Gardens in Japan, though of Chinese parentage, have more conventions and less complexity in lay-out than the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 日本園林，雖然源於中國，佈局的習俗化大於複雜化。

sentences.english: The structure variance of soil nutrient is bigger than the random variance.
sentences.chinese: 毛竹林土壤養分的結構性變異大於隨機變異。

sentences.english: Nudism, the council decided, was doing the resort more harm than good.
sentences.chinese: 委員會認定在休閒勝地的裸體行爲弊大於利。

sentences.english: The other kind of whale is much larger than the killer whale .
sentences.chinese: 其他種類的鯨魚要遠遠大於逆戟鯨。

sentences.english: "If you had told me that there was a claim of faster-than-light electrons, I would be a lot more skeptical," he says.
sentences.chinese: 如果你和我說的是存在大於光速的例子，我會更不信。

sentences.english: The leakage loss of methamidophos was more than that of fenvalerate.
sentences.chinese: 滲漏流失甲胺磷大於氰戊菊酯。

sentences.english: T Namely dS is greater than dq over T.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說就是dS大於dq除以。

sentences.english: All contents of the impurities in the nominal value shall not be greater than 3%.
sentences.chinese: 各雜質組分含量標稱值不確定度不得大於3%。

sentences.english: For proliferation inhibit, the effect of gasoline exhaust is slightly greater than methanol exhaust.
sentences.chinese: 汽油車尾氣對細胞增殖的抑制作用略大於甲醇車尾氣。

sentences.english: A roofer's compensation premium is greater than his gross salary.
sentences.chinese: 阿屋頂的補償溢價大於他的薪金毛額。

sentences.english: Time of recirculating and eluting must be over 3 h.
sentences.chinese: 迴流洗脫時間一定大於3小時。

sentences.english: As we have just stated, their misfortune was greater than they were.
sentences.chinese: 正如我們剛纔所說的，他們的不幸大於他們自己。

sentences.english: Its length from occiput to muzzle is greater than the width at the brow.
sentences.chinese: 從枕骨部到吻部的長度大於額頭的寬度。

sentences.english: The total bacteria numbers and population of each section daring the flood period are greater than in dry season.
sentences.chinese: 各斷面的細菌總數和種屬數，都是豐水期大於枯水期。

sentences.english: "At over $3 a gallon, it's high no matter what, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“油價大於每加侖3美元，怎麼看都是高的。”

definition: to act in a fit of pique/to get in a huff/to be peeved
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
satisfied just to get through (idiom); to muddle through/without high ambitions, but getting by
to count numbers/to keep to one's word/to hold (i.e. to remain valid)/to count (i.e. to be important)
to pay in advance/to get payment in advance
lit. chasing the wind and clutching at shadows (idiom); fig. groundless accusations/to act on hearsay evidence
to have achieved nothing/to be a total failure/to get nowhere
